Package Game.Logic

Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • Game.Logic.GameState
  • public class GameState
extends java.util.Observable
    This class tracks the state of a grid for either the player or the system. Validates guesses.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameState​(LogPanel logPanel, int boardDimension)
      Constructs a fresh state of the Battleship game and initializes an empty grid

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description

      Returns the grid containing the current state of the game

      Places a varying number of ships in random locations on the board.

      Resizes the grid to a new dimension and resets the state of the grid
      void updateHistoryPanel​(java.lang.String message)
      Updates the history log for the game with the provided message
      void validateGuess​(boolean isPlayer, int x, int y)
      Validates a player's/system's guess by checking if the grid contains a ship or not

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameState

        public GameState​(LogPanel logPanel,
                 int boardDimension)
        Constructs a fresh state of the Battleship game and initializes an empty grid
        Parameters:
        logPanel - Log panel for outputting move history and option history to
        boardDimension - Dimension for one side of the square grid

    • Method Detail

      • randomizeShipLocations

        public void randomizeShipLocations()
        Places a varying number of ships in random locations on the board. Number of ships placed changes on grid size.

      • resizeGrid

        public void resizeGrid​(int newGridDimension)
        Resizes the grid to a new dimension and resets the state of the grid
        Parameters:
        newGridDimension - New dimension of the board

      • getGrid

        public GridSquare[][] getGrid()
        Returns the grid containing the current state of the game
        Returns:
        Grid of GridSquares containing info about ships

      • validateGuess

        public void validateGuess​(boolean isPlayer,
                          int x,
                          int y)
        Validates a player's/system's guess by checking if the grid contains a ship or not
        Parameters:
        isPlayer - Indicates if it is checking the player or the system's board
        x - X coordinate of the guess on the grid
        y - Y coordinate of the guess on the grid

      • updateHistoryPanel

        public void updateHistoryPanel​(java.lang.String message)
        Updates the history log for the game with the provided message
        Parameters:
        message - Message to be added to the history log
